consideration of matters relevant to determining whether a person is, owing to mental illness, incapable of managing his or her affairs in respect of the proceedings held
debtor was a mentally disabled person at the time of service
personal service upon the debtor constituted a breach of the rules and a defect in the proceedings on the petition
the defect was not a formal defect or an irregularity
the sequestration order was effective though voidable
the order ought to be set aside rather than the bankruptcy annulled.
